byline.contributor: Raphael Minder contributed reporting from Madrid.

abstract: Russian fuel company Gazprom backs off on demands that Ukraine pay for natural gas it is sending to separatist rebels in Donbass region; Ukrainian energy company Naftogaz pays $15 million in hope that gas supply to country will not be cut off before upcoming round of talks.
lead_paragraph: A payment dispute that had been casting a shadow over European energy markets appeared to be winding down on Friday, as both countries agreed to European-brokered negotiations.

headline.main: Russia and Ukraine Move Toward Resolution of Feud Over Natural Gas Payments
headline.print_headline: Russia and Ukraine Move Toward Resolution of Feud Over Natural Gas Payments

snippet: A payment dispute that had been casting a shadow over European energy markets appeared to be winding down on Friday, as both countries agreed to European-brokered negotiations.
